layout.value:
__lv_expr__:{HorizontalLayout}:lively.morphic:new HorizontalLayout({
  align: "top",
  autoResize: false,
  direction: "centered",
  orderByIndex: false,
  padding: {
    height: 0,
    width: 0,
    x: 0,
    y: 0
  },
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  renderViaCSS: true,
  resizeSubmorphs: false,
  spacing: 2
})

__lv_expr__:{HorizontalLayout}:lively.morphic:new HorizontalLayout({
  align: "top",
  autoResize: false,
  direction: "rightToLeft",
  orderByIndex: false,
  padding: {
    height: 0,
    width: 0,
    x: 0,
    y: 0
  },
  reactToSubmorphAnimations: false,
  renderViaCSS: true,
  resizeSubmorphs: false,
  spacing: 2
})
